title: Deda gravel bike range expands from aero carbon Superzero to curvy alloy Gera bars & more!
content:
Deda Elementi expands their Gera & Superzero gravel bike component lineup with more price & performance options in carbon or alloy for both gravel racing and adventure riding. Gera gets more affordable, ergonomic & super curvy aluminum handlebars, plus new alloy wheels, while Superzero adds Dedaâ€™s first aero carbon gravel bars. And for those looking
